constituent: hedge, soil, dirt, ground, span, one, ceiling, sun, day, one, floor, one
heisigStory: The hedge depicted in this frame is the miraculous hedge of briar roses that completely spanned the castle grounds in which Sleeping Beauty lay for a hundred years, so that none but her predestined beloved could find his way through it.
koohiiStory1: Before the Great Wall of China, there was a dirt hedge that spanned across.
koohiiStory2: The HEDGE of roses growing from the castle grounds fully spanned the castle walls.
myStory: viên. hàng rào. hàng rào kéo dài đo đất
